org.batfish.dataplane.protocols

Class StaticRouteHelper

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Helper functions implementing logic related to handling of static routes

      • isInterfaceRoute

        public static boolean isInterfaceRoute(StaticRoute route)

      • shouldActivateNextHopIpRoute

        public static boolean shouldActivateNextHopIpRoute(@Nonnull
                                                   StaticRoute route,
                                                   @Nonnull
                                                   GenericRib<AbstractRoute> rib)
        Check if a static route with next hop IP can be activated. If this method returns True, an attempt should be made to merge it into the RIB. If it returns false, an attempt should be made to remove it from the RIB.
        Parameters:
        route - a StaticRoute to check
        rib - the RIB to use for establishing routabilitity to next hop IP
